Class DriveTrain

      • driveStraight

        public void driveStraight(double speedFactor)
        Drive forward or backward.

        This can be called within commands.

        Parameters:
        speedFactor - the fraction of full-speed to drive, ranging from -1.0 (backward at full power) to 1.0 (forward at full power)

        This can be called within commands.

      • mecanumDriveController

        public void mecanumDriveController(double gyroAngle)
        Drive using an xbox controller in Cartesian Mecanum Style using a gyro if present

        This can be called within commands.

        Parameters:
        gyroAngle - The angle that the gyro is currently at
